properties.facility_orderly: Nidaamka xaruntu wuxuu ahaa mid heersare ah oo leh kala dambeeyn.
properties.patients_treated_well: Indhaheeygu waxay qabteen bukaan si wanaagsan looga tixgalinayey.
properties.what_else_notice: Waxaan arkay hooyo xanuunsan oo si wanaagsan ay ula dhaqmayeen shaqaalaha.
